name: nemesis
description: A HUGE Nemesis-themed content pack capturing the block’s signature mechanics: Fading, Parallax-style fade-counter activations, Seals (sacrifice enchantments), Rebels & Mercenaries (library chainers), Spellshapers (discard-to-cast), Laccolith combat replacement, Saproling/Myr tokens, and set-flavored utility.

Creature: {1}{W}, {T}: {LIB_VERB}. for a Rebel permanent card with mana value 2 or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle.
{2}{W}, {T}: {LIB_VERB}. for a Rebel permanent card with mana value 3 or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle.
{3}{W}, {T}: {LIB_VERB}. for a Rebel permanent card with mana value 4 or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle.
Fading 3 (This permanent enters with three fade counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a fade counter from it. When you can't, sacrifice it.)
